creditline: Decorative Arts Department Deaccession Funds, the Putnam Dana McMillan Fund, and gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council in honor of Dr. Michael Conforti, Chief Curator and Bell Memorial Curator of Decorative Arts and Sculpture, 1980-1994
markings: two marks: right one is square (Head with mowhawk); left is diamond shaped (initials \'E.P.\'); stamped with poincon du maitre orfevre
object_name: Teapot, from a five-piece coffee and tea service
title: Teapot, from a five-piece coffee and tea service
